Title: Save the Platypus!
Plot: When Ming-Ming pays a visit to Tuck's cage, she messes with his things, causing him to declare he's not speaking to her. Not impressed, Ming-Ming begins a silent treatment of her own. Nevertheless, the two must still work together to help a platypus stuck on a river in Australia.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
